bulletPoints: Used Vue.js to build a personal resume web page with reusable components and custom styling
Followed Material Design principles to create a clean and modern web page showcasing professional work experience and technical skills
Maintained source code and kept track of progress using Git and Github issues, respectively
Collaborated with three other students to create a mobile and web social puzzle game using Cordova, Django and MySQL
Built a RESTful API to handle game logic and store data in MySQL database using Django
Used JavaScript and HTML/CSS as part of the Cordova framework to create a responsive client-side app
